subject_options: Woodfire Westport — one thing missing from your site
573 reviews, no contact form — worth fixing
email_body:
I came across Woodfire Westport while researching restaurants in the area and wanted to reach out directly.

You have 573 Google reviews at 4.6 — that is a strong reputation driving real traffic to your site. The one gap I noticed is that there is currently no contact form or booking pathway on the website, so visitors have no direct way to act on that interest.

I work with hospitality businesses in the west of Ireland on exactly this kind of improvement. A short conversion sprint — adding a contact form, click-to-call button, and reservation system — is typically a 7 to 10 day project with no disruption to your existing setup.

Would you have 15 minutes this week for a quick call so I can walk you through what that would involve?

Best regards
[Your name]
